overview: April 20th, 2008 :: Claudio Castagnoli squares off against the "Big Rig" Brodie Lee as their rivalry begins to boil. Vin Gerard continues to battle The Colony! Following his KO at "Deuces Wild," how does Tim Donst feel about the Order of the Neo Solar Temple? Incoherence defends los Campeonatos de Parejas in the main event. Matches featured:  1. Vin Gerard, Bull Pain vs The Colony  2. Chuck Taylor vs Hydra  3. Jimmy Olsen vs Player Uno  4. Ophidian vs Tim Donst  5. Amasis vs Helios  6. The Fabulous Four vs Mike Quackenbush, Shane Storm, Cheech, Cloudy  7. Sabian vs El Pantera  8. Brodie Lee vs Claudio Castagnoli  9. Campeonatos de Parejas Match F.I.S.T. vs Incoherence (c)
title: Chikara Passion and Persistence
